author: William Cummings
description: Former president Richard Nixon used the phrase to describe the Senate Watergate hearings, Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein reported in 1973.
title: Trump thinks he is the target of a 'witch hunt.' Nixon thought so too

author: FRAZIER MOORE
description: NEW YORK (AP) â€” Roger Ailes (aylz), who transformed TV news by creating Fox News Channel, only to be ousted at the height of his reign for alleged sexual harassment, died Thursday, Fox News reported. He was 77. A former GOP operative to candidates including Richard Nixon, Ronald Reagan and George H.W. Bush, Ailes later turned his media savvy to running TV networks. In early 1996 he accepted a challenge from media titan Rupert Murdoch to build a news network from scratch to compete with CNN.
title: Roger Ailes, media guru and political strategist, dies at 77
